languages.text: The Overseer has {uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage to their next attacking ability. If this ability kills an enemy, it doesn't count towards the attack limit, and the Overseer restores AP spent on it.

Надзиратель наносит на {uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% больше урона следующей атакой. Если эта атака убивает цель, она не входит в лимит атак на ход, а надзиратель восстанавливает потраченные на нее ОД.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} verursacht mit seinem nächsten Angriff +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % mehr Schaden. Tötet der Angriff das Ziel, fließt er nicht in das {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffslimit pro Zug{/g} ein und der Aufseher erhält die eingesetzten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.

traits.locale_text: Der Aufseher verursacht mit seinem nächsten Angriff +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % mehr Schaden. Tötet der Angriff das Ziel, fließt er nicht in das Angriffslimit pro Zug ein und der Aufseher erhält die eingesetzten AP zurück.

languages.text: La prochaine attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} inflige +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % de dégâts. Si elle tue la cible, elle n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g} et le surveillant récupère les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} dépensés pour l'effectuer.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.

traits.locale_text: La prochaine attaque du surveillant inflige +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % de dégâts. Si elle tue la cible, elle n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour et le surveillant récupère les PA dépensés pour l'effectuer.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}下次攻击造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}%。如果此次攻击击杀了目标，则此次攻击不会计入{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合的攻击上限{/g}，同时返还监察官此次攻击耗费的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.

traits.locale_text: 监察官下次攻击造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}%。如果此次攻击击杀了目标，则此次攻击不会计入每回合的攻击上限，同时返还监察官此次攻击耗费的行动点数。

languages.text: El siguiente ataque del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} inflige un +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % más de daño. Si el ataque mata al enemigo, no cuenta para el límite de {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataques por turno{/g} y el supervisor recupera los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} invertidos.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.

traits.locale_text: El siguiente ataque del supervisor inflige un +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % más de daño. Si el ataque mata al enemigo, no cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno y el supervisor recupera los PA invertidos.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}は、その次の攻撃で+{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}%の追加ダメージを与える。この攻撃で、ターゲットが倒された場合、ターンごとの{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻撃制限{/g}にカウントされず、監督官は消費した{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を回復する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.

traits.locale_text: 監督官は、その次の攻撃で+{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}%の追加ダメージを与える。この攻撃で、ターゲットが倒された場合、ターンごとの攻撃制限にカウントされず、監督官は消費したAPを回復する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bir sonraki saldırısında +%{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} daha fazla hasar verir. Bu saldırı, hedefi öldürürse {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz ve Gözetmen, saldırıda harcadığı {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}'yi geri kazanır.
